# mapDelegate

**Instance Property**

The object that serves as the delegate of the map template.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var mapDelegate: (any CPMapTemplateDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Handling Map Template Events

- **CPMapTemplateDelegate**: The protocol an object implements to handle events from a map template.
